title: Daniel LaPlante // 11
description:
In 1987, a small New England town is terrorized by a young man who has a penchant for messing with people’s heads. Between burglary, stalking, and even murder, he leaves no stone unturned. This is the story of Daniel LaPlante.
**GOING WEST DOES NOT OWN ANY OF THE NEWS CLIPS PRESENTED**
WCVB News: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hbD8NfbK4-I
